Standards compliance is an issue with any non-typical office document creator, which causes problems when file sharing and collaboration becomes critical. Also, browser applications rely on application files accessed on remote servers through the Internet. Therefore, when connection is interrupted, the application is no longer usable. [[Google Gears]] is a platform to ameliorate this issue and improve the usability of browser applications, its use is being superseded by the introduction of [[HTML5]] API's such as [[Web Workers]] and [[DOM storage]]. There is also a loss of flexibility, since many web applications are not [[open source]], preventing users from running them [[offline]] (in many cases), and making users dependent on third-party servers, while not allowing customizations of software.
